name: Pirate world
description: Planet had small pirate base, but they have now taken control of the planet.

name: Volcanic eruption
description: Massive volcanic eruption happens on planet, and rapidly changing planet to volcanic.

name: Climate cooldown
description: Climate suddenly cool downs, this could be catastorphic for life on planet.

name: Climate heat up
description: Climate suddenly heats ups, this could be catastorphic for life on planet.

name: Ascension portal
description: Planet is nodal world where ascension portal can be built.
